Uses of Interface
com.interface21.validation.Errors

Packages that use Errors
com.interface21.validation Provides data binding and validation functionality, for usage in business and/or UI layers. 
com.interface21.web.bind Provides web-specific data binding functionality, including a utility class for easy invocation of binding and validation. 
com.interface21.web.servlet.mvc Standard controller implementations for the MVC framework that comes with Spring.  
com.interface21.web.servlet.support Support classes for Spring's web MVC framework.  
com.interface21.web.servlet.tags Spring's standard custom tag library.  
 

Uses of Errors in com.interface21.validation
 

Classes in com.interface21.validation that implement Errors
 class BindException
          Default implementation of the Errors interface, supporting registration and evaluation of binding errors.
 class DataBinder
          Binder that allows for binding property values to a target object.

          Invoke the given validator for the given object and Errors instance.
 void Validator.validate(java.lang.Object obj, Errors errors)
          Validate an object, which must be of a class for which the supports() method returned true.
 

Uses of Errors in com.interface21.web.bind
 

Classes in com.interface21.web.bind that implement Errors

          Errors wrapper that adds automatic HTML escaping to the wrapped instance, for convenient usage in HTML views.
 class ServletRequestDataBinder
          Use this class to perform manual data binding from servlet request parameters to JavaBeans.
